title: Teen participates in family financial planning
description: Teen participates in family financial planning
content:
Scenario: Teen participates in family financial planning
    Given the family is planning for the coming year
    And Jasmine has savings goals for college
    And she contributes to household income through her part-time work
    When the family_elohim facilitates financial planning
    Then Jasmine should be included in the planning process
    And her goals should be incorporated into family financial strategy
    And she should learn how families make long-term financial decisions
    And her contributions (both household labor and income) should be factored into planning
    And she should practice the financial planning skills she'll need as an adult
    And the family should model transparent, participatory financial governance
